dc_description_s: Photocopy.; Date and original publication information from pencil note on verso: "Map of ... enlarged twice from the book 'Nepal' by Perceval Landon, Constable & Co. London, 1928."; Relief shown by shading and spot heights.; Also shows railways, roads, and passes.|86 x 113 centimeters, each sheet 46 x 61 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:435,000|General Map Collection
